chunks.text: Now, there is an IMG tag in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The way you will put it, SRC and Alt are required attributes.

chunks.text: First, if you write in SRC,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What happened by doing this?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Alt, what we wrote, where did it go?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can say, I will tell you where it went.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I put it in Alt.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: See, what we put in Alt, we didn't see that yet.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose, for some reason, the server can't see you.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Then what will happen?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose, I wrote image2 by mistake.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, image2.png is not here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, what will be the error?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will show you.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, here the Alt will be displayed.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And this kind of error image will be displayed.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which will tell you that,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you put the image correctly.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You have done something wrong.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here, the server's URL is not there.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: These are the things that are shown.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And there, Alt is shown.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, the user knows what is the purpose of this image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And if I come back here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can put Alt in the image like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What will happen if I don't put Alt?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I don't put Alt, then the text that was Alt will not come.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Nothing will happen.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, you won't want that when your server has an error,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then you will see the image like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is the scenario.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.text: See this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, the image is straightforward.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There are two more attributes of this image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which are very important.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: One is the width.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which is width in pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I do 23, width is equal to...

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In fact, I will correct the image first.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I wrote image 2 by mistake.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Image.png.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have taken 23 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Which is very small.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I will do 230 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You don't need to write Px in this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: When we write width in CSS,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: we will see that we need to write Px.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Or, we write number in width is equal to double quotes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, if I bring this here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: you can see that this is a small image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I give it height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I mean, I give it height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I said, if I keep the height of 230,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then its aspect ratio will be reduced.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, it will be a little stretched.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Because it has also made its width 230.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It also makes the height 230.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If you want height 230.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And width automatically adjusted.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Then you can use height attribute.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, remove the width.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, the height of 230 will be fixed.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And the width will be adjusted automatically.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Width has been adjusted automatically.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And height has been taken.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, what happens is that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Width and height can be adjusted through CSS.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And we will see in the section of CSS.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Why should we always set this width and height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We should always set one thing from width and height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Such that, when our page load is happening.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Then our image inside the page

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: will not come to the page.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you in the coming videos.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But, you can understand this now.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The attributes of Width and height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Many people, I have told that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: they have heard that they have been deprecated.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: They should not use it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But I say, they should use it for this purpose.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Why should they do it?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you in the coming videos.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Where I will tell you about Core Web Vitals and SEO.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For now, you can understand that Width

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: gives the image, height gives the image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If someone has set one of them.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Then the second one automatically sets.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And these values are in pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And you don't have to write Px or pixel.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You just have to write this number.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And that's it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is an attribute, height.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And it is an SRC attribute.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: An Alt attribute.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can use style attribute in this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In fact, you can use style attribute

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: with almost all tags.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this was about the image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, we will talk about the tables in HTML.

chunks.text: Here, we used table tag.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, rows, span, and call span attributes.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now, you see here that rows, span means that

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how many rows your TD will span.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For example,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let us say, I write here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want that SAM and programmer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Earlier, we were taking one Excel.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: SAM was taking one Excel programmer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I want to write in two cells.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I want that I don't want to write in program.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I just want to write SAM.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I want to write here that call span is equal to 2.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, call span is equal to 2 means

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that SAM will now take place of two columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What does it mean?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It means that SAM will now take place of two columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: That is, SAM will show something like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will show you.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, this has taken place of all these columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, call span means

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how many columns will be rounded.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: By default, one column will be rounded.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And one cell will be rounded.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: To demonstrate this, I will explain it to you with Excel.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And now, we will talk about the list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: List is very important

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Because we will use the list a lot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There are three types of lists in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We have an ordered list, an unordered list

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and a definition list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The most used unordered and ordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's look at the unordered list first.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Sometimes, we want to have unordered data.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For example, I will write UL here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, I will write UL here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This means unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can write Li in this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I can write Harry.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I can write Rohan.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And then I can write Shubham.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, when I write Harry Rohan Shubham

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: here, I will write UL here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is an unordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Look, Harry Rohan Shubham is here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There is no order for this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: He didn't come in 1, 2, 3, 4.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But if I want this to be ordered,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can write this with the help of OL.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I make this opening, closing tag OL

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and keep the rest same,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then this will be ordered list.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So, in this, 1, 2, 3 will come.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can do this 1, 2, 3 with ABC.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can customize it by using type attribute.
